name: Perception refraction via your eyes
description:
Eye contact is a type of body language that is extremely important during communication and conversation. Sometimes our eyes and body language speak louder than words. 

When you become creative, your brain retreats into its memory cave. 

Engaging in eye contact when you're deep in creative thought and on the verge of a brilliant breakthrough can kill your moment of insight. 

Pay attention to what you see. Tighten your mirror neurons and try to understand what you really see. 

Your eyes will not deceive you.
